EmailSubject
data.value: Onboarding

data.name: SyncStartedEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as an owner of **{1}**.
{4} requested that GMM systematically manage this group's membership based on predefined rules. You can find more specifics on the predefined rules in the GMM UI.
The group **{1}** with Object Id: {0} **has started its initial sync**.

data.name: SyncCompletedEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as an owner of **{1}**.
{4} requested that GMM systematically manage this group's membership based on predefined rules. You can find more specifics on the predefined rules in the GMM UI.
The group **{1}** with Id: {0} **has completed its initial sync**.
**{2} users were added.**
**{3} users were removed.**

data.name: DisabledJobEmailSubject
data.value: Management Alert

data.name: SyncDisabledNoGroupEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as an owner of this group.
Membership syncs for group with object Id {0}, previously named **{1}**, are now **disabled** because the group **no longer exists**.
If this is an intended deletion, there's no further action needed.
Otherwise, contact support for further help.

data.name: SyncDisabledNoSourceGroupEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as an owner of this group, **{1}**.
Membership syncs for group **{1}**, are now **disabled** because its pre-defined source group with object Id: {2} **no longer exists**.
Please reach out to support to update the source definition and re-enable the membership syncs.

data.name: SyncDisabledNoOwnerEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as an owner of this group, **{2}**.
Membership syncs are **disabled** because **GMM is not an owner** of **{2}** with object Id {0}.
Contact support if you would like to re-enable GMM.

data.name: CustomerPausedJobEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as the owner of **{0}**. Your group **{0}** is currently disabled from Group Membership Management (GMM) due to one of the following reasons:
• Source and/or destination group(s) no longer exist. • Group owner did not take action on a drastic membership change alert. • Group owner paused syncs for more than 30 days.
If you believe this group should still be managed by Group Membership Management (GMM), please take the necessary actions via GMM UI or reach out to support to request the assistance before {2}.
If not remediated by {2}, your group's affiliation with GMM (including its membership definition) will be removed. You will need to re-onboard if you still want GMM to manage your group after that date.

data.name: CustomerPausedJobEmailSubject
data.value: Group Membership Management (GMM) update

data.name: DecreaseThresholdMessage
data.value: Decrease membership threshold {0}%. Detected threshold {1}%.

data.name: IncreaseThresholdMessage
data.value: Increase membership threshold {0}%. Detected threshold {1}%.

data.name: NoDataEmailContent
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of **{1}**.
Membership syncs for **{1}** with Id {0} have been paused since the membership definition provided currently indicates that there should be no users in the destination..
Please reach out to support to get this issue resolved.

data.name: NoDataEmailSubject
data.value: Group Membership Management - No data found for group {1}

data.name: SyncDisabledNoValidGroupIds
SyncJobDisabledEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group. Please visit {3} to learn more about GMM.
The synchronization job for group {0} with Id: {1} has been disabled.
If you would like to have it re-enabled please reach out to {2}.
The group sync will be PAUSED until your response is received.

data.name: SyncThresholdBothEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group. Please visit {3} to learn more about GMM.
The group {1} with Id: {0} has exceeded the specified thresholds.
{2}
What is Threshold?
The Configurable Threshold is a feature of GMM aimed to protect group membership from drastic changes caused by unexpected reasons such as re-organization, source group reconstruction, etc. It alerts the group requestor that the membership change will go beyond the specified Threshold and provides an opportunity for the requestor to review and confirm before GMM takes action.
This is a default-on feature for all the groups, but you may request to update the threshold number or choose to disable this feature all together. Please note GMM does NOT log the individual member to be added or removed due to PII concerns, so we are unable to provide this information.
Actions needed - Please 'Reply All' indicating what GMM should do about the threshold by highlighting one of the following options.
1. The membership change looks right. Please allow the threshold to be exceeded this time only. 2. The membership change looks right. Please allow the threshold to be exceeded, and update the default threshold to X%. 3. The membership change looks right. I don’t need the threshold check in the future so please disable this feature. (Not recommended) 4. The projected increase or decrease does not look right to me. Please do not allow the sync to exceed the threshold. I will contact support to follow up.
The group sync will be PAUSED until your response is received.

data.name: SyncThresholdDisablingJobEmailSubject
data.value: [Action Required] GMM: Synchronization job for group {1} has been disabled.

data.name: SyncThresholdEmailSubject
data.value: [Action Required] GMM: Membership Change Alert review for {0}.

data.value: Ignore Thresholds Once
